page.title: 19HEALTH IN SHALBOURNE AREA
page.content: It is important that people in this area are reasonably healthy as there are{no}practising{doctors or dentists living in it. There is no chemist's shop. Great Bedwyn 2 miles away has 1 doctor, Hungerford 4 miles away has a practice with 3 doctors, all treating patients in this area, but for all minor ailments people must go to town. With only a limited bus service, to visit the surgery or collect a pre- scription those without a car have to rely on help. The nearest Maternity facility is{Savernake Hospital}backed up by{Princess Margaret Hospital}in Swindon. Any form of health visiting has to be arranged through the local practices. There is a{Meals-on-Wheels service but at present only one old lady of nearly 100 takes it.{Church, {Good Companions and the shop watch {over the wellbeing of the elderly.
